SEARCH
Package de.fherfurt.lat.api.resources

Klasse StudioResource

java.lang.Object
de.fherfurt.lat.api.resources.StudioResource
public class StudioResource extends Object
RESTful resource class for managing studio entities.

This resource provides endpoints to retrieve, create, and delete studio entities. It interacts with the IStudioService to perform operations on studio entities and uses the Mapper to convert between entities and data transfer objects (DTOs).

The following HTTP methods are supported:

  • GET - Retrieve all studios or a specific studio by ID
  • POST - Create a new studio
  • DELETE - Remove a studio by ID
Siehe auch:
  • IStudioService
  • Mapper
  • StudioService
  • StudioDto

  • Konstruktordetails

    • StudioResource

      public StudioResource()
      Constructs a new StudioResource and initializes the studio service.

      The StudioService is used as the implementation of IStudioService.

  • Methodendetails

    • getStudio

      @GET @Path("{studioId:\\d+}") @Produces("application/json") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getStudio(@PathParam("studioId") int studioId)
      Retrieves a specific studio by its ID.

      If the studio with the specified ID is found, it is returned as a JSON response. If not found, a 404 (Not Found) status is returned.

      Parameter:
      studioId - the ID of the studio to retrieve.
      Gibt zurück:
      a Response containing the StudioDto if found, or a 404 status if not found.

    • getStudios

      @GET @Produces("application/json") public List<StudioDto> getStudios()
      Retrieves a list of all studios.

      This method maps the Studio entities to StudioDto objects and returns them as a JSON list.

      Gibt zurück:
      a list of StudioDto objects representing all studios.

    • createStudio

      @POST @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createStudio(StudioDto studioDto)
      Creates a new studio.

      This method accepts a StudioDto in the request body, converts it to a Studio entity, and attempts to save it using the studio service. If the studio is successfully created, a 201 (Created) status is returned. If the creation fails, a 304 (Not Modified) status is returned.

      Parameter:
      studioDto - the StudioDto representing the studio to be created.
      Gibt zurück:
      a Response indicating the outcome of the create operation.

    • deleteStudio

      @DELETE @Path("{studioId:\\d+}") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteStudio(@PathParam("studioId") int studioId)
      Deletes a specific studio by its ID.

      If the studio with the specified ID is found and successfully deleted, a 200 (OK) status is returned. If the studio is not found, a 404 (Not Found) status is returned.

      Parameter:
      studioId - the ID of the studio to delete.
      Gibt zurück:
      a Response indicating the outcome of the delete operation.
